message:
SYSTEM: Presentacion_WORKS-yg-dgV1.pdf: Página 4
3 
Current issues with existing publication approaches 
Only executable workflow is published: 
1.
Must have the same codes to re-execute 
the workflow, but: 
–
Codes become unavailable 
•
Eg: eHits was proprietary and replaced by 
AutodockVina 
–
Different labs prefer different codes  
•
Eg: R vs Matlab 
•
Eg: viz in Citoscape vs yEd 
2.
Must have the same workflow framework 
to re-execute the workflow 
–
Must have R for Weaver 
3.
Must import files to local file system and 
workflow framework 
–
Must import bundle of workflow/data/code 
files to reproduce 
Workflow:  
Workflow/scripts describing  
dataflow, codes, and parameters 
Text: 
Narrative of method, 
software packages used 
Data: 
Key datasets and figures/plots 
Reproducible Article:  
Weaver, GenePattern GRRD, etc.
speaker: SYSTEM
